price: Nuti ishee irraa teessuma (haasa'a) dhageeffachuuf teenyu qabna turre. Namni amma dhageeffate immoo qaanqee (urjii) isa eeggatu isaaf arga.
arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā kunnā naqʿudu min'hā maqāʿida lilssamʿi faman yastamiʿi al-āna yajid lahu shihāban raṣadan
